product.description: If you’re looking for a youthful glow, this skincare trio is the way to go. Three active ingredient-packed products prevent free radical damage, reduce fine lines, and stimulate cell repair.
product.title: Renewing Trio
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: To keep aging at bay, use ingredients that pack a punch like peptides (reduce muscle contractions similar to botox) and stem cells (boost cell regeneration). Plus, don't forget SPF.

product.description: Defend against sun damage with this sheer, weightless lotion.
product.title: Oil Free Matte SPF 30
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Use it as a protective primer before putting on makeup, or mix it with a hydrating mist for a lighter application.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply evenly over face at least 15 minutes before going into the sun. Reapply after swimming, sweating, or towel drying.

product.description: Illuminate your skin overnight with a cocoon of hydrating ingredients.
product.title: Brightening Night Balm
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Warm the balm between your fingertips and apply to serumed skin as a little treat.
product.how_to_use_copy: Press a tiny amount onto clean, dry skin on the face and neck just before bed.

product.description: Relieve pain, reduce inflammation, and stimulate circulation before or after exercise.
product.title: I-Recover Mind & Body Gel
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Try it to stimulate circulation in your legs during or after a long flight.
product.how_to_use_copy: Massage liberally onto sore muscles before or after a workout, or any time you’re feeling tight.

product.description: Cleanse and control oil with this gentle daily gel.
product.title: Balancing Cleansing Gel
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: If skin starts to feel tight after cleansing, reduce use to once daily.
product.how_to_use_copy: Wet your hands and face with warm water, then vigorously rub a drop of the gel into your palms before massaging it into your face and neck. Rinse with warm water and repeat if necessary.

product.description: Boost circulation and give yourself some extra glow with this infused oil.
product.title: Detox Body Oil
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Apply the Detox Body Oil right after dry brushing, or even with a dry brush, working upwards in a circular motion starting from the feet.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply a generous amount to clean, dry skin and gently massage for a hydrating boost.

product.description: Protect your skin while giving your cells the nutrients they need to stay healthy.
product.title: Radiant Day Shield
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Apply in between your skincare routine and applying makeup for a glowing boost and environmental protection.
product.how_to_use_copy: As the last step before you put on makeup, shake well and apply one full dropper to the face, neck, and décolléte.

product.description: Simultaneously cleanse and exfoliate with this dual-action, retexturizing cream cleanser.
product.title: Skin Resurfacing Cleanser
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Massage into skin for at least 30 seconds to allow exfoliating lactic acid to hydrate and brighten.
product.how_to_use_copy: Lather in hands and apply to damp face and neck. Massage with light, upward strokes before rinsing clean. Pat skin dry and follow with a toning mist or moisturizer.

product.description: An ultra-replenishing mask that rapidly restores dehydrated skin.
product.title: MultiVitamin Power Recovery Masque
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Use as a gentle exfoliant 2-3 times per week on dry or sensitized skin.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply to cleansed skin. Let mask sit for 10-15 minutes before rinsing thoroughly and following with moisturizer.

product.description: All of the benefits of a super rich night cream in a lightweight serum format.
product.title: Bio-Energy Lift Serum
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Applying a serum to well toned skin will help with product efficacy. Don't be shy with your Lavender Honey!
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply a pea-sized amount of this serum onto fingertips and massage into skin in an upward, circular motion. Follow with moisturizer.

product.description: Help irritated skin finds its zen through daily use of this calming and balancing serum.
product.title: Calm Skin Arnica Booster-Serum
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Mix a few drops of serum with a mask or an exfoliant for an added boost to your usual routine.
product.how_to_use_copy: Massage 2-3 drops directly onto skin. Follow with moisturizer.

product.description: An electrical facial in the palm of your hand, plus everything you need to get started.
product.title: Microcurrent Device + Golden Gel
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: This handheld nano and microcurrent device is basically a professional facial at home. Mix and match different settings (straight from the app) to target a variety of skin concerns.
product.how_to_use_copy: Pair your phone with the ZIIP device, and select the treatment you want to do. Apply gel to cleansed skin immediately before using the ZIIP device. Follow along with step-by-step instructions from founder Melanie Simon. Rinse with water. Follow with moisturizer (and SPF during the day!).

product.description: An optimal conductor for ZIIP's nano and microcurrents that also targets firmness, sagging, and lines.
product.title: Golden Conductive Gel
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: This gel is perfect if your focus is on fine lines and aging gracefully.
product.how_to_use_copy: Cleanse skin. Apply gel immediately before using the ZIIP device. Rinse with water to remove. Follow with moisturizer (and SPF during the day!).

product.description: A rich hand cream with both a lightweight formula and packaging, perfect for on-the-go.
product.title: Blomma Hand Cream
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: The skin on your hands should be treated the same as your face, so always follow up with SPF.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply generously to hands and massage into skin until fully absorbed.

product.description: Build a barrier against environmental threats with this protective cream.
product.title: Advanced Protection Cream
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Mix in a drop or two of your favorite face oil for a hydration boost.
product.how_to_use_copy: Massage a pea-sized amount into cleansed skin all over the face and neck.

product.description: Calm irritation and soothe inflammation with this complimentary duo that work together to strengthen and heal skin.
product.title: Calming Duo
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Treat sensitive skin with poweful anti-inflammatories that calm and reduce redness. Then, nourish and strengthen the skin to combat future irritation—rosehip oil contains vitamins and essential fatty acids that rebuild and regenerate healthy new skin tissue.

product.description: Refill your Water Lock Moisturizer from Tata Harper with these genius pods.
product.title: Water-Lock Moisturizer Refill Pod
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Water Lock is an ideal makeup primer as it creates a smooth, hydrated canvas. Once you have the Water Lock Moisturizer, the this Refill Pod is all you'll need to replenish.
product.how_to_use_copy: Use one pump on clean skin, applying to the face and neck in upward strokes. Follow with sunscreen if using in the AM.

product.description: Protect and hydrate your lips with this conditioning balm.
product.title: Lip Balm Antioxidant+3 Complex
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Use it as a glossy topcoat for lip color.
product.how_to_use_copy: Dispense a tiny amount onto your fingertip and evenly spread across your lips.

product.description: Minimize shine while balancing and hydrating skin so breakouts heal faster.
product.title: Blemish Balm
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Use as a refreshing aftershave lotion to calm and soothe skin, especially razor bumps.
product.how_to_use_copy: After cleansing skin, apply preferred serum. Massage Blemish Balm into skin until absorbed.

product.description: Reverse signs of aging overnight with this potent facial oil.
product.title: Holy Basil & Retinol Ageless Night Oil
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: To start, only use it every other night to allow your skin to adapt. Always wear SPF the following morning.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply one or two pumps to clean, dry skin before bed.

product.description: These are an on-the-go wonder for a quick cleanse and slight exfoliation.
product.title: Essential Face Wipes
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: These wipes make the perfect travel and gym bag companion. Plus, they mimic the amazing qualities of Ursa Major's 4-in-1 Essential Face Tonic.
product.how_to_use_copy: Tear the packet open. Wipe the towelette thoroughly across your forehead, face, neck, and ears. Then, dispose of the towelette and packet.

product.description: A natural deodorant with notes of bergamot, pink lemon, orange blossom, and cardamom.
product.title: N° Green Deodorant
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: To increase product effectiveness, always apply to thoroughly dry skin. Wet skin will dilute the product and decrease effectiveness.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply to clean, dry skin. Do not apply to broken skin.

product.description: Target impurities and balance oil with this foaming cleanser that leaves a clear, matte finish.
product.title: Clarifying Cleanser
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Apply, and let this cleanser sit on your skin for a few minutes for a quick, cooling mask. It can also be used in conjunction with the Tata Harper Regenerating Cleanser. Try the Clarifying cleanser in the morning, and the Regenerating cleanser at night for oily, breakout-prone skin.
product.how_to_use_copy: You'll want to apply this cleanser onto dry skin both in the AM and PM. Massage one pump of product onto face and neck, and then rinse with warm water. Follow with Tata Harper Hydrating Floral Essence. Warning: Avoid direct contact with eyes.

product.description: Battle everyday environmental stressors with this boost of antioxidant power.
product.title: Rosehip Seed Regenerating Facial Oil
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Give your daily moisturizer a boost by adding in a few drops of facial oil. Plus, you'll save on time.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply a half-pump of oil into your palm, rub together, and press into skin. Or, add a few drops of oil to your water-based moisturizer to turn two steps into one.

product.description: A multi-tasking, preventative eye treatment that plumps fine lines and protects against environmental damage.
product.title: Restorative Eye Crème
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Apply to the elevens and around the lips to reduce vertical wrinkles.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply one pump to clean skin around the entire eye area (including lids) with gentle, tapping motions. Avoid direct contact with the eyes.

product.description: An antioxidant-rich, superfood powder blend that can be mixed into any drink to boost skin's immunity and glow.
product.title: Original Turmeric Latte Blend
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: This yummy turmeric blend supports skin goals from the inside out.
product.how_to_use_copy: Try it in water, milk, coffee, or smoothies! Blend 2 teaspoons per serving to combine with your favorite hot or cold drinks.

product.description: Detoxify your skin with this purifying mask.
product.title: Deep Cleanse Antioxidant Masque
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Use a spatula to prevent contaminating the mask before it touches your skin.
product.how_to_use_copy: Spread a generous layer to clean, dry skin, avoiding the eyes and mouth. Leave it on for at least 15 minutes. Then, massage with damp fingers to melt away the mask, before fully rinsing with warm water.

product.description: Clean your body without leaving skin feeling dry and raw.
product.title: Body Cleanser Chamomile, Bergamot & Rose
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Use a dry brush before showering to stimulate lymphatic flow, increase circulation, and minimize cellulite over time.
product.how_to_use_copy: Dispense one pump onto your hands or a body sponge and massage over wet skin. You can also add one pump under running water when you draw a bath.

product.description: Rescue tired, blemished skin with this remarkably effective cleanser.
product.title: Ocean Cleansing Mudd
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Try it as a clarifying body wash on blemished body parts like your chest or back.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply this cleanser to wet skin and gently massage all over your face and neck, avoiding the sensitive areas around your eyes. Rinse with warm water.

product.description: Polish and nourish your skin at the same time with this gentle scrub.
product.title: 2-In-1 Resurfacing Exfoliant
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Leave it on for a few minutes to allow the fruit AHAs to penetrate deep into the skin. Then rinse with warm water.
product.how_to_use_copy: Gently massage into damp skin on the face, neck, and chest with your fingertips or a brush.

product.description: A non-aerosol mineral mist that's lightweight, nourishing, and protecting.
product.title: PLAY 100% Mineral Body Mist SPF 30 with Marigold Extract
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Shake well before spritzing. This mist should spray white, but dry clear.
product.how_to_use_copy: Spray generously over skin for full body coverage.

product.description: A natural deodorant with notes of cedar, white mask, jasmine, and guaiacwood.
product.title: Cedar Flora Deodorant
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: To increase product effectiveness, always apply to thoroughly dry skin. Wet skin will dilute the product and decrease effectiveness.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply to clean, dry skin. Do not apply to broken skin.

product.description: Give your skin some shine while saving it from the sun with pure physical protection.
product.title: Glow Getter Nutrient Boosted Daily Sunscreen SPF 30
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Most people prefer this on their body, but you can dab it on your cheekbones and nose as an SPF highlighter.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply liberally, all over your body, at least 15 minutes before going in the sun. Reapply every two hours, or after 40 minutes of swimming or sweating. Formula separation is totally normal; just shake and knead the packaging before use.

product.description: Lift away dead skin and scrub away the day’s grime with this balanced exfoliator.
product.title: Virtuous Circle Facial Exfoliator
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: It’s gentle enough to use as an everyday exfoliant, as well as a starter for teenagers or those with suppressed immune systems.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply a small amount to clean, dry skin. Then, wet your hands and massage the skin, sloughing away dead skin and other impurities. Follow with a toner or moisturizer, whichever your routine calls for.

product.description: A natural deodorant with notes of sea salt, bergamot, white musk, and jasmine.
product.title: California Deodorant
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: To increase product effectiveness, always apply to thoroughly dry skin. Wet skin will dilute the product and decrease effectiveness.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply to clean, dry skin. Do not apply to broken skin.

product.description: Even skin tone, reduce hyperpigmentation, and brighten dull spots with this lightweight oil.
product.title: Balancing Face Oil
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Blend with your favorite moisturizer for a boost in hydration and a healthy glow.
product.how_to_use_copy: Gently press a couple drops into the skin after moisturizing.

product.description: A mineral sunscreen that serves as Broad Spectrum protection and a tinted primer.
product.title: Mineral Tinted Face Sunscreen in "Medium/Dark"
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Apply this sunscreen 15 minutes prior to sun exposure. Reapply every two hours, or after 40 minutes sweating or swimming. Don't forget your ears and the back of your neck!
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply a pea-sized amount to clean hands and pat onto face and neck. This may be worn after or in place of your daily moisturizer.

product.description: Remove impurities without stripping your skin’s natural barrier.
product.title: Ocean Cleanser
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: You can use this with some water as a shaving lotion for your face or body, as the seaweed formula softens the skin and hair.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply this cleanser to wet skin and gently massage all over your face and neck, avoiding the sensitive areas around your eyes. Rinse with warm water.

product.description: Relax and turn your focus inward with these soothing aromatherapy salts.
product.title: Calm Soaking Salts
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Use a body oil after taking a salt bath to further nourish your skin and extend the luxurious experience.
product.how_to_use_copy: Add approximately 1/4 of the bottle to each bath, and let dissolve for a minute or two before stepping in.

product.description: Brighten the skin and reduce blemishes with this marine-derived serum.
product.title: Chlorella + Reishi Sea Vitamin C Sérum
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Blend a single drop with a spritz of your favorite toner to mimic your skin’s natural moisture
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply generously to cleansed skin. Follow with a moisturizer at night and SPF in the morning.

product.description: A deep-cleansing detox mask that gently, but effectively clears congestion and refines pores.
product.title: Dinner Out
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Soak the included muslin cloth in warm water to remove using gentle, circular motions.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply an even layer to clean, dry skin. Allow it to sit for 8-10 minutes. Rinse clean.

product.description: Like a hydrating hug for parched skin, this weekly thirst-quenching treatment restores moisture levels and soothes stressed out skin.
product.title: Hydrating Floral Mask
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: You can also use the Hydrating Floral Mask as an overnight treatment for supercharged hydration. Apply a thin layer in place of your typical PM moisturizer.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply a thick layer to clean skin and let sit for 20 minutes before rinsing with warm water. For a supercharged treatment, apply a thick layer over the Tata Harper Resurfacing Cleanser and leave on for 10 minutes before rinsing.

product.description: Packed with chlorophyll and other detoxifying superfoods, this powder-to-gel mask is like a green juice for your face.
product.title: Clean Greens Face Mask
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Apply water drop-by-drop to this product to get the right consistency. You can even try adding in a drop of moisturizer for a thicker consistency. The potent greens may stain towels, so remove excess mask with a damp wipe or cotton swab before rinsing.
product.how_to_use_copy: Blend 1 teaspoon of the powder with a few drops of water to activate. Mix until mask reaches a a smooth gel consistency. Apply a thin, even layer over cleansed face and neck for 5-15 minutes. Rinse clean with cool water.

product.description: This trio brightens skin from the inside out, correcting uneven complexion, fading dark spots, and protecting from further hyperpigmentation.
product.title: Brightening Trio
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Treating pigmentation can be tricky, so it's important to address in multiple steps of your routine. Sunscreen is a MUST to prevent further pigmentation from occurring.

product.description: Mentally transport back to the comfy Heyday facial chairs during a busy day or before bed.
product.title: Chill Aromatic Alchemy
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Try adding a few drops of the Chill Aromatic Alchemy to a bath, pillowcase, or directly on the temples to calm anxiety and soothe nerves.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply a few droplets into cupped hands or on wrists. Press hands together and cup over nose. Take 3 deep breaths in through the nose and out through the mouth.

product.description: An aluminum-free deodorant that eliminates underarm odor while absorbing moisture.
product.title: Hoppin' Fresh Deodorant
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply to clean, dry underarms each morning for all day protection.

product.description: A hydrating powerhouse duo that infuses cells with water and nutrients for softer, plumper, more supple skin.
product.title: Hydrating Duo
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: To target dehydration, you must replenish the skin's barrier with both water and oil—water to make up for the lack of it in the skin and oil to prevent further moisture loss.

product.description: Defend against cellular sun damage while hydrating your skin with this mineral sunscreen.
product.title: Cellular Protection Sun Cream SPF 30
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: This vegan formula is great for your whole body, especially your hands.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply liberally at least 15 minutes before going in the sun. Reapply every two hours or after swimming, towel drying, or sweating.

product.description: A gorgeously rich overnight moisturizer that reveals youthful, brighter skin both instantly and in the long-term.
product.title: Crème Riche
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Blend Creme Riche with your favorite retinol serum for a powerhouse overnight treatment.
product.how_to_use_copy: Before applying, activate the cream's sugars by massaging the product in your hands until it transforms into a white velvet cream. Then, apply to face and neck. Apply SPF afterward when using in the morning.

product.description: Remove makeup and impurities with this silky cream cleanser.
product.title: Cleansing Lotion
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: People with sensitive skin can remove this cleanser with a warm, damp cloth for a gentler experience.
product.how_to_use_copy: Massage a dime-sized amount into damp skin for 30–60 seconds, and rinse with warm water.

product.description: An brightening serum that treats both active and underlying hyperpigmentation.
product.title: Pigment Lightening Serum
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: For best results, use morning and night. Remember pigmentation requires exfolation, SPF, and patience.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply a pea-sized amount to clean skin or affected areas. Follow with moisturizer and SPF.

product.description: This replenishing body exfoliant leaves skin cleansed, and noticeably smooth.
product.title: Purifying Body Exfoliant
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: For an aging décolletage or the dreaded bacne, this product is the perfect shower addition to combat concerns.
product.how_to_use_copy: Cleanse body as usual. Then, work exfoliant into the skin using gentle, circular motions, focusing on rough patches (elbows, knees, feet) and problem areas (congestion, signs of aging). Rinse off, and follow with a body moisturizer.

product.description: Harness the magic of microderm to stimulate cell renewal for instantly brighter, younger-looking skin.
product.title: Doctor's Scrub Ruby Crystal Microderm Exfoliator
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Gently work over your lips to banish dry skin. For more sensitive skin types, start out slower at 1-2x per week.
product.how_to_use_copy: Gently massage onto clean, damp skin in circular motions. Rinse clean.

product.description: A natural deodorant with notes of petitgrain, vetiver root, geranium leaf, and citrus rind.
product.title: The Botanist Deodorant
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: To increase product effectiveness, always apply to thoroughly dry skin. Wet skin will dilute the product and decrease effectiveness.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply to clean, dry skin. Do not apply to broken skin.

product.description: A natural deodorant with notes of rose, Italian mandarin, violet, and cedar root.
product.title: Third Rose Deodorant
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: To increase product effectiveness, always apply to thoroughly dry skin. Wet skin will dilute the product and decrease effectiveness.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply to clean, dry skin. Do not apply to broken skin.

product.description: Take your routine to the next level with this nightly deep cleansing device that gently cleans pores of dirt, oil, and debris.
product.title: LUNA Mini 3
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Upgrade your weekly at-home treatments with this extra boost of massage and manual exfoliation.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply a pea-sized amount of gel cleanser into skin. Turn LUNA Mini on and gently massage the skin in tiny, circular motions. A slight vibration will indicate it's time to move to the next section. Continue until built in timer shuts off. Rinse LUNA Mini clean. Dry, and store.

product.description: Hydrate the deepest layers of your skin while plumping fine lines at the surface.
product.title: Instant Smoothing Serum
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Use it right before you go out or take a selfie — it’s a great instant plumping and priming fix.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply a thin, even layer to cleansed and toned skin. Follow with moisturizer.

product.description: Take your hydration to new, multitasking heights with this triple threat: a cleansing balm, mask, and overnight—all in one.
product.title: Advanced Hydration Mask
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: This mask can be used as an effective hydration support treatment daily. So when you need an extra hydration boost, add the mask as a layer over your moisturizer for an overnight treatment.
product.how_to_use_copy:
Cleansing Balm: Massage a generous amount of the mask over your face and neck. Spend 3-4 minutes massaging the mask into skin and then remove with a dry or damp cloth.
Treatment Mask: Apply mask on damp skin and leave on for 15-25 minutes. Option: mist your favorite hydrating mist over your face while the mask sets. Remove the mask with a clean dry cloth and finish with your favorite finishing products.

product.description: Soften skin and reduce hyperpigmentation with this oil cleanser.
product.title: Natural Cleansing Oil
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: People with sensitive skin can remove this cleanser with a warm, damp cloth for a gentler experience.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply to clean, dry skin, then wet your hands and massage to emulsify the oil. Rinse thoroughly.

product.description: An overnight breakout healing treatment that attacks bacteria while soothing and calming the skin beneath.
product.title: Banish Solution
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Always keep skin moisturized and hydrated while you're dealing with acne so skin can heal!
product.how_to_use_copy: Allow product to settle to the bottle base (don't shake). Dip a cotton swab into the bottle and dab onto breakout. Allow to sit for a couple of hours or overnight before removing with warm water. A slight tingle on contact is normal. Decrease frequency of use if you experience anything more.

product.description: Clear acne-prone skin with this exfoliating, inflammation-soothing mask.
product.title: Blue Tansy Resurfacing Clarity Mask
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Follow the Blue Tansy Resurfacing Clarity Mask with your favorite hydrating mask for superior product absorption.
product.how_to_use_copy: Spread a thin layer over cleansed skin, avoiding the eye area. Allow it to set for 10 minutes. Rinse clean with warm water.

product.description: Like a coach for your skincare routine, this smart tool analyzes your skin's health and creates a cleansing program just for your unique skin profile.
product.title: LUNA FoFo
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Keep track of skin health daily. You can always spend more time on congested areas like the chin. Be sure to keep your device clean and dry when not in use.
product.how_to_use_copy: Turn on LUNA Fofo by holding the center button until the light starts blinking, indicating the Bluetooth is connected and your device is ready to begin the skin analysis. Press and hold the skin sensors to the face areas according to the instructions in the app. The Foreo app will analyze your skin's moisture index and skin age, and then sync a customized cleansing routine to your device. Apply cleanser to your face, dampen the Fofo, and gently glide the device over the skin in small, circular motions. The tool will pause to indicate when it's time to move to the next area. When finished, rinse both your face and the Fofo clean.

product.description: Like a coach for your skincare routine, this smart tool analyzes your skin's health and creates a cleansing program just for your unique skin profile.
product.title: LUNA FoFo
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Keep track of skin health daily. You can always spend more time on congested areas like the chin. Be sure to keep your device clean and dry when not in use.
product.how_to_use_copy: Turn on LUNA Fofo by holding the center button until the light starts blinking, indicating the Bluetooth is connected and your device is ready to begin the skin analysis. Press and hold the skin sensors to the face areas according to the instructions in the app. The Foreo app will analyze your skin's moisture index and skin age, and then sync a customized cleansing routine to your device. Apply cleanser to your face, dampen the Fofo, and gently glide the device over the skin in small, circular motions. The tool will pause to indicate when it's time to move to the next area. When finished, rinse both your face and the Fofo clean.

product.description: Step out of the shower feeling smoother, softer, and refreshed with this body scrub.
product.title: Intensive Body Exfoliant
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Use the Intensive Body Exfoliant before shaving for a smooth glide. It’s also great on back acne or keratosis pilaris (also known as “chicken skin”) behind the arms and thighs.
product.how_to_use_copy: Gently massage into your body while you're in the shower. Leave on for 5–10 minutes then rinse with warm water. Follow with a body lotion or oil. Turn up the exfoliation by applying it to dry skin before getting in the shower or bath.

product.description: Start your morning with this vitamin-rich, brightening serum.
product.title: Vitamin Sea Serum
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Spray your favorite hydrating mist before applying to help it spread more easily.
product.how_to_use_copy: After cleansing, apply a small amount for an immediate antioxidant boost.

product.description: Relieve and restore irritated skin with this complete moisturizer.
product.title: The Anthemis Soothing Moisturizer
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: As a calming moisturizer, it’s also great as after sun exposure or on insect bites.
product.how_to_use_copy: Dispense a dime-sized dollop and gently rub into cleansed skin all over your face and neck. Follow with SPF in the morning or facial oil at night.

product.description: Uplift the senses and boost hydration with an invigorating spritz.
product.title: Orange Blossom Balancing Mist
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Use freely throughout the day, or try it on dry areas like knees or elbows before moisturizing.
product.how_to_use_copy: After cleansing, close your eyes and spritz a few pumps toward your face. Or, apply to a cotton swab and press gently across face, neck, and chest.

product.description: Get ready to glow with this anti-inflammatory, hydrating mask.
product.title: Kantic Brightening Moisture Mask
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Mix the Brightening Mask into a moisturizer during drier seasons or environments to create an all-day treatment.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply a thin layer over a cleansed face and neck. Allow it to sit for 10-15 minutes, then rinse thoroughly. Follow with moisturizer.

product.description: Get ready to glow with this anti-inflammatory, hydrating mask.
product.title: Kantic Brightening Moisture Mask
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Mix the Brightening Mask into a moisturizer during drier seasons or environments to create an all-day treatment.

product.title: Micro Peel Pads
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Once the skin can tolerate it, you can leave this product on (instead of it rinsing off)—after about two weeks of use.
product.how_to_use_copy: Wipe pad gently over cleansed skin. Allow it to sit for 10-20 minutes. Rinse clean. Allow skin to acclimate to the product before introducing daily.

product.description: A rich facial cream that corrects and prevents signs of aging and environmental damage.
product.title: Concentrated Firming Moisturizer
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Retinol products should only be applied at night due to photosensitivity. It's normal to experience light flaking or redness when first introducing a retinol into your routine.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply a pea-sized amount to cleansed skin using gentle, upward motions.

product.description: A dermatologist-formulated serum that turns back the clock on aging skin.
product.title: Concentrated Firming Serum
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Retinol products should only be applied at night due to photosensitivity. It's normal to experience light flaking or redness when first introducing a retinol into your routine.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply a dropper-full to cleansed skin in gentle, upward motions.

product.description: Accelerate the lifecycle of early-stage pimples that are lurking under the skin's surface.
product.title: Micropoint For Blemishes
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: If the micropoint patch brings the pimple to the surface (resulting in a whitehead), use a Might Patch Original to finish the job.
product.how_to_use_copy: After cleansing, apply a patch on top of the breakout. Press and seal into the skin. Allow it to work overnight or at least 6 hours.

product.description: This aromatic exfoliator polishes dry lip skin away with delicate sugar crystals.
product.title: Rose Diamonds Lip Exfoliator
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Masking is a great option right after exfoliation. Since you've removed all the dead skin cells, the mask will be able to nourish deeper and hydrate more.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply to damp lips and massage gently before rinsing clean.

product.description: An ultrasonic device that exfoliates and cleans debris from pores to enhance penetration of active ingredients.
product.title: Dermapore Pore Extractor & Serum Infuser
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Use Dermapore up to 3x a week at night. Using the tool at night will give your skin a deep clean while enhancing product penetration. Use both modes in tandem to achieve nearly treatment room results.
product.how_to_use_copy: Before using, make sure to cleanse your skin and remove any excess makeup. While using the pore cleaning mode, keep skin damp with water or feel free to mist skin with your favorite hydrating mist. Press the power button once to activate the Extract mode, which is indicated by a steady vibration and a white light. Make sure to use steady, even pressure as you glide the device on your face and neck. Keep the spatula flat on the skin, and pay close attention to areas that are more prone to blackheads and congestion. To clean after using the Extract mode, rinse with soap and water and use alcohol on a cotton pad. You can use the Infuse mode right after the extract mode or on its own. Apply a generous amount of your serum and/or cream onto your face and neck. To activate the Infuse mode, press the power button twice, which is indicated by a tapping vibration and a blue light. Use the flat portion of the device to glide over your products. Do not dig into your skin with too much force, and use the tool in upward motions.

product.description: An all-in-one cleanser that removes both the obvious grime (dirt, makeup) and unsuspecting pollutants that are invisible to the naked eye.
product.title: Gentle Hydrating Cleanser
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: This is a fantastic, gentle cleanser to use after professional facial treatments like microdermabrasion or peels.
product.how_to_use_copy: Add water to a nickel-sized amount and massage into damp skin using upward and outward movements before rinsing clean. This product is safe to use around the eyes to remove makeup, too.

product.description: This lightweight, dewy moisturizer melts into the skin for a velvety, matte finish.
product.title: Mangosteen Gel Moisturizer
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Apply another layer for double hydration.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply a thin, even layer over a cleansed face and neck area. For a lighter application, mix a small amount of product with a few drops of water. For an extra boost, apply a thicker layer in dry areas.

product.description: Wash your hands the right way with this sophisticated soap.
product.title: Hand Wash Sweet Orange, Cedarwood & Sage
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Use it to clean your makeup brushes — just make sure to let them air dry after.
product.how_to_use_copy: Wet your hands, then lather a single pump all over, between your fingers, in your cuticles, and around your wrists, for a full 20 seconds. Then rinse with warm water.

product.description: Boost hydration with this mask featuring thirst-quenching honey from New Zealand.
product.title: Manuka Honey Hydrating Gel Mask
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Leave it on overnight and to give thirsty skin the moisture boost it craves, and rinse it off in the morning.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply a generous amount to the face, neck, and décolleté but avoid your eyes. Let the mask sink in for at least 20 minutes, or leave it overnight.

product.description: Purify your skin with this plant-powered foaming cleanser.
product.title: Botanical A Facial Cleanser
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Great as a second step after oil cleansing, to get rid of any debris left behind.
product.how_to_use_copy: Massage a pea-sized amount of cleanser into damp skin using gentle, circular motions. Rinse thoroughly with warm water.

product.description: Protect your skin with this nourishing mineral sunscreen.
product.title: Clean Freak Nutrient Boosted Daily Sunscreen SPF 30
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: This sunscreen rubs in easily, so it’s great for squirmy toddlers on the beach.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply liberally, all over your body, at least 15 minutes before going in the sun. Reapply every two hours, or after 40 minutes of swimming or sweating. Formula separation is totally normal; just shake and knead the packaging before use.

product.description: Moisturize inflamed or sensitive skin with this lightweight cream.
product.title: The Pioneer
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Blend a touch of rosehip oil when you skin feels extra dry or dehydrated.
product.how_to_use_copy: Massage one or two pumps into clean, dry skin on the face and neck. Use daily in the mornings, or whenever your skin needs a moisture top-up.

product.description: Part-exfoliator, part-cleanser for smooth, radiant, healthy skin.
product.title: Regenerating Cleanser
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Spend more time on areas with extra congestion, such as the nose, for a more focused exfoliation. Plus, for a hydrating boost, apply a thick layer of the Tata Harper Hydrating Floral Mask and leave on for 10 minutes—instant glow!
product.how_to_use_copy: You'll want to apply this cleanser onto dry skin both in the AM and PM. Massage a pea-sized amount onto face and neck until product turns white, then rinse with warm water. If you're removing makeup, use one full pump of the product. Follow with the Tata Harper Hydrating Floral Essence. Warning: Avoid direct contact with eyes.

product.description: This potent, but gentle treatment exfoliates and brightens for your daily dose of glow.
product.title: Resurfacing Serum
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: This is an exfoliating product, so make sure to apply SPF daily.
product.how_to_use_copy: Massage 1-2 pumps onto to clean, toned face and neck—avoiding the eye area.

product.description: A moisturizing hand lotion infused with sun protection to shield your skin from damaging UV rays and signs of aging.
product.title: Hand Cream SPF 15
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: This product can also be applied to feet for sun protection and moisture.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply a pea-sized amount to clean hands, blending onto palms, fingers, wrists, and forearms.

product.description: A mineral sunscreen that serves as Broad Spectrum protection and a tinted primer.
product.title: Mineral Tinted Face Sunscreen In "Light/Medium"
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Apply this sunscreen 15 minutes prior to sun exposure. Reapply every two hours, or after 40 minutes sweating or swimming. Don't forget your ears and the back of your neck!
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply a pea-sized amount to clean hands and pat onto face and neck. This may be worn after or in place of your daily moisturizer.

product.description: A rose-infused mist that instantly hydrates, increases product efficacy, and serves as a lovely midday pick-me-up.
product.title: Hydrating Floral Essence
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Combine a few sprays with a few drops of your favorite facial oil for a luxurious night treatment.
product.how_to_use_copy: To boost product efficacy, saturate clean skin with 4-5 spritzes and follow with your favorite serums and moisturizers on damp skin. Apply 2 spritzes to set makeup, and as needed during the day.

product.description: This dual retinol-vitamin serum simplifies your nighttime routine while visibly repairing, hydrating, and brightening skin.
product.title: Skin Refining Night Oil With Retinol and Vitamins C+E
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Use on cuticles for a nourishing treatment.
product.how_to_use_copy: Warm a few drops of the oil between your palms and press into your face and neck at nighttime.

product.description: Hydrate and balance your skin with this misting toner.
product.title: Jasmine Green Tea Oil Control Toner
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Use a cotton swab for application to absorb any excess residue.
product.how_to_use_copy: After cleansing, shake the bottle and spritz your face 3–5 times. Then, gently pat into your face.

product.description: A series of ultra-nourishing, calming treatments that leave skin supple, soft, and glowing.
product.title: Euphoria Face Mask
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Keep the mask in the fridge for a refreshing, hydrating boost during the summer months.
product.how_to_use_copy: Remove the mask from its pouch and unfold. Peel away plastic backing and apply the moistened side to clean, dry skin. Squeeze any excess serum from the pouch and apply directly to your neck, décolleté, or hands. Leave on for 15-20 minutes before removing the mask, and lightly massaging any remaining serum into the skin.

product.description: Boost hydration with this firming, moisturizing formula.
product.title: Hyaluronic Sea Serum
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Let it completely absorb before you apply any moisturizer.
product.how_to_use_copy: After cleansing, apply this plumping serum onto skin to deliver an instant antioxidant boost.

product.description: Glow from head to toe with this all-over body oil.
product.title: Undaria Algae Body Oil
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: This oil is especially effective after dry brushing your skin, which stimulates lymphatic flow. Plus, it helps highlight colors in body art and tattoos!
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply a generous amount to damp skin and gently massage until it’s completely absorbed.

product.description: Wash away makeup and other impurities with this fan-favorite cleanser.
product.title: Milk Cleanse
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Mix with the One Love Organics Microderm Scrub and Mask for a one-step exfoliating cleanser.
product.how_to_use_copy: Use this cleanser in two rounds. First, apply to dry skin and massage to remove makeup and other grime. Second, apply to moist skin in a gentle circular motion. Rinse with warm water.

product.description: Instantly quench thirsty skin with this adaptogenic serum.
product.title: Plump Jelly Hyaluronic Serum
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Try a tiny amount on your lips for a healthy dose of plumping elements.
product.how_to_use_copy: Dispense 1–2 pumps onto your hands and apply to clean skin on the face and neck. It’s great for your hands, too.

product.description: Exfoliate dead skin with a cocktail of plant acids and nourishing botanicals.
product.title: Acid Potion
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Sunburn Alert: Use sunscreen daily and limit sun exposure while using the Moon Juice Acid Potion for a week afterwards.
product.how_to_use_copy: Shake well and apply to clean face and neck, avoiding the eye area. Follow with your serum or moisturizer.

product.description: Dramatically reduce fine lines, wrinkles and pigmentation with this advanced serum.
product.title: BioLumin-C Serum
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: When using in the morning, follow with SPF for complete protection and hydration.
product.how_to_use_copy: Dispense 4–5 drops onto your palm, and apply all over your clean face in gentle, pressing motions.

product.description: Use this daily moisturizer to defend against sun damage.
product.title: Dynamic Skin Recovery SPF 50
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Use it as a substitute for moisturizer whenever you're going to spend a lot of time in the sun, like on vacation.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply liberally to the face and neck at least 30 minutes before going in the sun. Use a pressing motion to help it absorb.

product.description: Nourish dry hands and experience a dose of aromatherapy with this restorative hand lotion.
product.title: Soothing Hand Cream Cactus Flower, Cedarwood Atlas, Tri-Hyaluronan Complex
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Dab a bit onto your fingertip and rub into the cuticles for extra penetration.
product.how_to_use_copy: Squeeze a dollop onto clean, dry hands and massage into all the nooks and crannies until completely absorbed.

product.description: Resurface from head to toe and emerge from the bath with healthy, glowing skin.
product.title: Coco Rose Exfoliating Bath Scrub
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Don’t leave the jar in the shower. Tightly close the lid, and store in a cool, dry place.
product.how_to_use_copy: Scoop a generous amount into the palm of your hand and massage into damp skin all over your body below the neck. Let it sit for a minute or two. Rinse clean.

product.description: Supercharge skin clarity and brightness overnight with this enhanced oil.
product.title: Evening Primrose + Green Tea Algae Retinol Face Oil
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Start by using it two or three nights a week. Remember to use SPF the morning after.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply a few drops to your face, neck, and chest after toning.

product.description: Deep clean sensitive, damaged skin with this rich oil cleanser.
product.title: Middlemist Seven Gentle Cream Cleanser
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Use the dual muslin cloth for gentle exfoliation and, in turn, softer skin.
product.how_to_use_copy: Pump a nickel-sized drop and massage it into damp skin, avoiding the eyes. Rinse with cool water and continue with toner, or the next step in your routine.

product.description: Illuminate your complexion with this gentle gel cleanser, rich in brightening vitamin C and antioxidants.
product.title: Brightening Cleanser
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Leave the Brightening Cleanser on for 5-10 minutes for a flash exfoliating mask.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply a pea-sized amount to damp skin and massage into a light lather before rinsing clean.

product.description: Illuminate your complexion with this gentle gel cleanser, rich in brightening vitamin C and antioxidants.
product.title: Brightening Cleanser
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Leave the Brightening Cleanser on for 5-10 minutes for a flash exfoliating mask.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply a pea-sized amount to damp skin and massage into a light lather before rinsing clean.

product.description: Restore hydration, and repair against free radical damage with this antioxidant-rich facial toner.
product.title: CoQ-10 Toner
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: This toner is an incredible post-workout skin reset or as quick refresh throughout the day.
product.how_to_use_copy: Spritz toner onto a cotton pad or directly onto cleansed skin, before any serums or moisturizers.

product.description: Gently exfoliate and sweep away dead skin cells while promoting lymphatic drainage to reveal glowing, smoother skin.
product.title: Dry Brush
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Wash your brush with a mild soap or shampoo at least twice a month and hang to dry. Dry brushing is best done before showering. Plus, this tool makes a great gift.
product.how_to_use_copy: On completely dry skin and starting at your ankles, move the brush in long, circular, upward motions directed towards the heart. Pressure should be gentle but firm. Do not use on open or irritated skin.

product.description: Chill out puffy eyes and inflammation with this convenient tool that refreshes dark circles and soothes inflamed breakouts.
product.title: Ice Roller
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Make sure to clean the ice roller after each use with soap and water, letting it dry before placing it back in the freezer. Keep the roller in a clean container for freezer storage to avoid contamination.
product.how_to_use_copy: Gently roll over clean skin as needed, or over a hydrating mask as a treatment. Use in the morning to depuff skin, before makeup application to prep skin, or to soothe an active breakout.

product.description: A non-medical-grade reusable face mask made of soft cloth and adjustable ear loops.
product.title: Protective Face Masks
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Snap a selfie while wearing your headband and tag @heydayskincare to be featured on our Instagram!

product.description: A non-medical-grade reusable face mask made of soft cloth and adjustable ear loops.
product.title: Protective Face Masks
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Snap a selfie while wearing your headband and tag @heydayskincare to be featured on our Instagram!

product.description: A non-medical-grade reusable face mask made of soft cloth and adjustable ear loops.
product.title: Protective Face Masks
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Snap a selfie while wearing your headband and tag @heydayskincare to be featured on our Instagram!

product.description: Save your look and your skin with this protective, translucent setting powder.
product.title: Polish Detoxifying Body Scrub
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: To clean, pull the brush from the magnetic base and wash with mild soap and lukewarm water.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply a generous amount to dry skin all over the body, massaging it in with circular motions. Rinse completely.

product.description: Holifrog's gentlest cleanser — this is like washing your face with a calming lotion.
product.title: Tashmoo Water Lily Nourishing Milky Wash
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: If you cleanse twice a day, the Milky Wash is perfect as at least one of the washes because everyone can benefit from reduced inflammation and a gentle touch.
product.how_to_use_copy: Massage on damp skin in slow circular motions and take your time as it sinks in. Rinse and pat dry.

product.description: A repairative salve that cleanses to remove makeup and daily grime while hydrating your skin.
product.title: Kissimmee Vitamin F Therapy Balmy Wash
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Since Kissimmee is 85% oil content, you've got to emulsify properly in order to lift the oil off your skin. A quick rinse the way you would with a water-based formula isn't going to do the trick, so make sure to take your time with this product.
product.how_to_use_copy: Massage on dry skin in slow circular motions. Then massage warm water over the oil to emulsify. Follow by a final rinse to whisk away any final traces.

product.description: Resurface and reveal healthy skin with this 11% AHA/BHA blend that stimulates cell turnover while providing nourishing moisture.
product.title: Halo AHA + BHA Evening Serum
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Can be used nightly but not with other products containing exfoliating actives. Always wear sunscreen, but especially the day after using this serum.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply a full dropper into hands and pat gently all over face and neck after cleansing and toning. Follow with moisturizer.

product.description: An exfoliating cleanser that reduces breakouts without stripping your skin of much-needed moisture.
product.title: Shasta AHA Refining Acid Wash
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: If you cleanse twice a day, we recommend alternating Shasta AHA Refining Acid Wash with a creamy cleanser like Holifrog's Tashmoo Water Lily Nourishing Milky Wash to strengthen your skin’s barrier.
product.how_to_use_copy: Massage on damp skin in slow circular motions and take your time as it sinks in. Rinse and pat dry.

product.description: Treat your lips to hydrating comfort with this sleek, all-day balm.
product.title: Remedy Conditioning Lip Balm
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Dab a little bit onto your cheeks as an impromptu bronzer for extra glow.
product.how_to_use_copy: Apply directly onto clean lips and gently press with fingertips to fully absorb.

product.description: A vegan creamer and skin supplement formulated to hydrate skin from the inside out and preserve your natural collagen.
product.title: Collagen Protect™ Vegan Creamer for Skin, Hair & Nails
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: There are no additives, so it may clump initially — blend for maximum yum.
product.how_to_use_copy: Add 2 tbsp to coffee or smoothies.

product.description: This water-activated powder cleanser gently brightens and smoothes skin texture.
product.title: Sunapee Sacred-C Brightening Powder Wash
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: Tweak your mixture’s ratio depending on whether you want a stronger scrub with a thicker paste (powder > water) or a light, foamy lather for a gentle, buffing cleanse (water > powder).
product.how_to_use_copy: Add a few drops of water to a pea-sized amount of powder and emulsify together to activate the formula.

product.description: A serum that floods pores with moisture to soothe rough texture and balance skin’s sebum levels.
product.title: Galilee Dewy Drops
product.treatment_room_tip_copy: You can add in a smidge of your moisturizer or drop of your face oil for added nourishing hydration.
product.how_to_use_copy: Massage a few drops into skin after cleansing and toning as a replenishing serum.
